name: codeql-tools
description: A collection of tools for managing the enablement of GitHub Advanced Security CodeQL

scripts.build: npm run build:configure-codeql && npm run build:emass-promotion && npm run build:enforce-code-scanning-remediation && npm run build:parse-build-steps && npm run build:upload-database && npm run build:validate-emass-json && npm run build:validate-monorepo-access && npm run build:verify-codeql-usage && npm run build:verify-scans
scripts.build:configure-codeql: npx rimraf configure-codeql/dist && npx @vercel/ncc build configure-codeql/index.js -o configure-codeql/dist
scripts.build:emass-promotion: npx rimraf emass-promotion/dist && npx @vercel/ncc build emass-promotion/index.js -o emass-promotion/dist
scripts.build:enforce-code-scanning-remediation: npx rimraf enforce-code-scanning-remediation/dist && npx @vercel/ncc build enforce-code-scanning-remediation/index.js -o enforce-code-scanning-remediation/dist
scripts.build:generate-csv: npx rimraf generate-csv/dist && npx @vercel/ncc build generate-csv/index.js -o generate-csv/dist
scripts.build:parse-build-steps: npx rimraf parse-build-steps/dist && npx @vercel/ncc build parse-build-steps/index.js -o parse-build-steps/dist
scripts.build:upload-database: npx rimraf upload-database/dist && npx @vercel/ncc build upload-database/index.js -o upload-database/dist
scripts.build:validate-emass-json: npx rimraf validate-emass-json/dist && npx @vercel/ncc build validate-emass-json/index.js -o validate-emass-json/dist
scripts.build:validate-monorepo-access: npx rimraf validate-monorepo-access/dist && npx @vercel/ncc build validate-monorepo-access/index.js -o validate-monorepo-access/dist
scripts.build:verify-codeql-usage: npx rimraf verify-codeql-usage/dist && npx @vercel/ncc build verify-codeql-usage/index.js -o verify-codeql-usage/dist
scripts.build:verify-scans: npx rimraf verify-scans/dist && npx @vercel/ncc build verify-scans/index.js -o verify-scans/dist

author: GitHub Expert Services
